qa.title: What is the main purpose of this planner?
qa.description: This planner helps you focus on up to five key goals to move steadily toward your main goals.

qa.title: Can I track progress toward my goals?
qa.description: Yes, you can link tasks to specific goals and view your progress through weekly and overall statistics.

qa.title: How do I add a new task?
qa.description: Click the plus button next to your goal on the selected day and fill in the task details.

qa.title: What happens after I complete all tasks for today?
qa.description: You’ll unlock a full-color quote of the day and move closer to unlocking the special puzzle coloring page.

qa.title: Can I use the planner for a week ahead?
qa.description: Yes, the planner allows you to plan tasks for each day of the week and connect them to specific goal steps.
